full_summary:
# Tender Notice

## Title
### English: Effluent Lift Station Equipment Add-On
### French: Matériel complémentaire pour station de relèvement des effluents.

## Tender Number
### Solicitation Number: 23-58216
### Reference Number: cb-981-17270938
### Amendment Number: 4

## Tender Status
The tender is no longer accepting submissions as it has expired.

## Description
The National Research Council Canada requires the supply of one (1) self-contained skid to pump effluent from an effluent pit to an Actini Biokill decontamination tank. The skid must adhere to biocontainment requirements for CL2 organisms and integrate with the existing ACTINI Ultima 1000L/H Biological Kill system.

## Specifications
- Required equipment must be able to pump effluent in a closed containment manner.
- Biocontainment requirements must be met to handle CL2 organisms.
- The equipment must integrate with the ACTINI Ultima Biological Kill system.

## Notice
Advance Contract Award Notice. The procurement method is an advance contract award notice.

## Regions
- Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
- Regions of Delivery: Canada

## Terms and Conditions
- The contract is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
- The terms and conditions of the contract will be determined by the contracting entity.

## Contact Information
- Cindy Romain, Contract Specialist
- Email: cindy.romain@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
- Phone: 613299-2748
- Address: 6100 Avenue Royalmount, Montreal, Quebec, Canada H4P 2R2

## Attachments
To view the tender notice, please go to the following links:
- English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30944/npp_acan_23-58216_effluent_skid_ctmf_v0.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30944/acan_23-58216_bsl2_effluent-skidv4_en_.pdf
- French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30944/acan_23-58216-_bsl2-effluent-skid_final_french_v4.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default
